  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int port) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Server
      Parameters:
      port - the port to listen on
      Throws:
      IOException - if the server socket cannot be created, for example, because the port is already bound.

  • Method Details

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Returns the port on which this server is listening for connections.
      Overrides:
      getPort in class SocketServer
      Returns:
      the port on which this server is listening for connections

    • acceptConnections

      public void acceptConnections() throws IOException
      Accepts connections and starts a new thread for each connection. This method will block until the server socket is closed, for example by invoking closeServerSocket.
      Overrides:
      acceptConnections in class SocketServer
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when waiting for a connection

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the server socket. This will cause the server to stop accepting new connections. If called from a different thread than the one running acceptConnections, then that thread will return from acceptConnections.
      Overrides:
      close in class SocketServer

    • handleConnection

      protected void handleConnection(Socket socket)
      Creates a new connection handler for the given socket.
      Specified by:
      handleConnection in class SocketServer
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket for the connection

    • addClient

      public void addClient(ClientHandler ch)
      Adds a client to the server.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client handler

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(ClientHandler ch)
      Removes a client from the server.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client handler

    • newGame

      public void newGame(ClientHandler ch1, ClientHandler ch2)
      Create a new game on the server side.
      Parameters:
      ch1 - first client in the game
      ch2 - second client in the game

    • move

      public void move(ClientHandler ch, String move)
      Make a move on the game on the server side.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client making the move
      move - the move

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver(DotsAndBoxesGame game, ClientHandler player1, ClientHandler player2)
      Checks if the game is over or not. If it is, then remove the clients form the game and the game itself.
      Parameters:
      game - the game
      player1 - the first client in the game
      player2 - the second client in the game

    • gameOverDc

      public void gameOverDc(ClientHandler ch)
      Sending the game over by disconnect message to the client side.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client

    • queue

      public void queue(ClientHandler ch)
      Put a client in the queue. If there is already someone in the queue, make a game with the two clients.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client queueing up

    • deQueue

      public void deQueue(ClientHandler ch)
      Remove the client from the queue.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client to remove.

    • hello

      public void hello(ClientHandler ch)
      Send the hello protocol to the client side.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client to send the protocol to.

    • list

      public void list(ClientHandler ch)
      Send the list of clients connected to the server to a client.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client to send the protocol to.

    • login

      public void login(ClientHandler ch, String name)
      Send the LOGIN protocol to the client if the username is available. Send the ALRERADYLOGGEDIN protocol if it is not.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client logging in
      name - the username chosen

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(ClientHandler ch, String msg)
      Handle a message coming from the client side.
      Parameters:
      ch - the client
      msg - the message

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Main method for the server.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments
      Throws:
      IOException
